title: Man Medium Skin Tone Bald
description: A bald man with a medium skin tone. Represents a male individual with a shaved head and a neutral complexion.
apple_vendor_description: The bald man emoji with a medium skin tone, as seen on Apple devices, presents a friendly and approachable profile with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and smooth gradients. The subtle play of realistic lighting across his head and face conveys a sense of warmth and sincerity. On Apple devices, this emoji is a versatile representation of an individual, conveying a sense of presence, reliability, or a neutral personal identifier in digital communication.
